html.p: What: Convert data in rows to data in columns

ol.li: Field names used in the output are based on how you call the command

html.p: Why: Few rows with many columns can be hard to read or scroll through
So What: Reorient data in a much easier to consume way

The data we are using for this command: | makeresults format="csv" data="Name,Pigeons_counted,Location Dave,-500,Belfast Rich,60,Berlin Frankie,1000,Bethlehem Sinatra,30000,Barstow Flyboy,400000,Boise"

search.query: | makeresults format="csv" data="Name,Pigeons_counted,Location Dave,-500,Belfast Rich,60,Berlin Frankie,1000,Bethlehem Sinatra,30000,Barstow Flyboy,400000,Boise"

panel.title: After transpose
panel.html: This is what it looks like after transposing columns for rows and assigning the Name field as headers

search.query: | makeresults format="csv" data="Name,Pigeons_counted,Location Dave,-500,Belfast Rich,60,Berlin Frankie,1000,Bethlehem Sinatra,30000,Barstow Flyboy,400000,Boise" | transpose header_field=Name column_name="Who did what now?"
